songs.full_title: Dynamic Trio by AK Bandamont (Ft. Kasher Quon & Teejayx6)
songs.title: Dynamic Trio

description.plain: Since AK Bandamont is also a scam rapper. Teejayx6 & Kasher Quon have made 2 songs called “Dynamic Duo” & “Dynamic Duo 2”. They linked up with AK to make “Dynamic Trio”.

songs.embed_content: Read “Dynamic Trio” by AK Bandamont on Genius

annotatable.title: Dynamic Trio

body.plain: Since AK Bandamont is also a scam rapper. Teejayx6 & Kasher Quon have made 2 songs called “Dynamic Duo” & “Dynamic Duo 2”. They linked up with AK to make “Dynamic Trio”.

songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsDynamic Trio Lyrics[Intro]
(Yeah, Baby, you did this one)
(Yeah, Baby, you did this one)

[Verse 1: Teejayx6]
Robbed a nigga and took all his jewelry, he told the police
Bitch, that's just an Instagram page, you don't really know me
I just scammed twenty PS4s from Sony
Niggas fucked up in the crib eatin' Coney

[Verse 2: AK Bandamont]
I just knocked my granny out, she had to call brodie
Just robbed a nigga eight times for twenty-four, I'm finna call Kobe
My Arab sellin' cards, he made a hundred, but they was all stolies
My dog will take your card and punch a site to load up our trophies
[Verse 3: Kasher Quon]
I just bought a new presi', that's a gold trophy
Stop tellin' hoes that you know me, you is not my homie
This bitch just said come over 'cause she lonely
My dog'll come kill you for a meal 'cause he hungry

[Verse 4: Teejayx6]
Told that bitch, "I don't wanna fuck 'cause you ugly"
Slapped a white nigga 'cause he called me a monkey
Me and Bandamont sellin' Bibles to the junkies
I can't go a day without gettin' high, I'm a junkie

[Verse 5: AK Bandamont]
I dropped out of school in fifth grade, I was a big flunky
Bitch pulled up on me, she gave me forty, I told the bitch suck me
Haha, I guess it went backwards
I made a cool thirty off sellin' the Bible, I'm in a big chapter

[Verse 6: Kasher Quon]
Both of them hoes' lips crusty, I don't know who's chapper
Everybody be lyin' nowadays, I don't know who a capper
Yeah, we both poured up Wock', but my cup is blacker
Yeah, your bitch got a fat ass, but my bitch is fatter

[Verse 7: Teejayx6]
I got a Perc-10 in my system, I'm so high
If a lil' nigga run up on me, he gon' die
How much money have I made off scams? It been a lot
Shoot a nigga with an AK like I'm Bandamont
You might also like[Verse 8: AK Bandamont]
Ma dukes asked why I keep a MacBook, 'cause I scam a lot
Yeah, you say you got a Glock 30, but it jam a lot
I just popped a Perc-30, now I itch a lot
I shoot that bitch precisely like Steph Curry, this a different shot

[Verse 9: Teejayx6]
He tried to hit my bitch DM, but he missed his shot
I just caught an opp out in public, but I missed my shot
I just wasted a four of Hi-Tech 'cause I missed the pop
'Cause I'm tryna pour up again and I'm already high

[Verse 10: Kasher Quon]
I don't know if I should smoke the Runtz or the Turtle Pie
That nigga be cappin', all he do is tell fairytales
That ain't real Larry 'cause I know how real Larry smell
I heard you got locked for five hundred and couldn't pay the bail

[Verse 11: AK Bandamont]
My granny asked how I'm livin', I said very well
My dog pulled up with six pints, I checked every seal
You can't tax a hundred for that eighth, I bet Larry will
My doggy dropped the 'Cat and did the race and broke every wheel
Back in '015, I ran up twenty sellin' certain pills
Sellin' certain pills, do fraud, 'cause that's a certain stealEmbed

songs.title: Withdrawls
songs.embed_content: Read “Withdrawls” by AK Bandamont on Genius
songs.lyrics:
3 ContributorsWithdrawls Lyrics[Intro]
Yeah, AK Bandamont nigga, Uh

[Verse 1]
Soon as I make the dope lock, turn the heat on
Grandma died at a young age, she grew up watching buddy breathe coke
Assault rifles and automatic glizzys with the bleekholes
I had them jackboys jack you out yo shit you better think close
The day I jumped into this shit I couldn't think, no
I'm at the traphouse now with bitches on me but they ain't hoes
I got a roll of dogshit on me and it can't fold, we almost took lil doggie out the game but we came close
And if you on the shit I'm on, we in the same boat
I was on that 95, dodgin the jakes on the state road
I just shot a nigga up close, I gotta change clothes
I'm goin through withdrawls like where the pills and where the drank go
I already ran through 20 chops, I need a draco
I'm finna color wrap the Glock and paint it maple
I can spend 20 a week for 90 days, bitch I'm stable
We took the cord off doggie life, and pulled the cable
I'm finna put her on the road, cuz she a angel
I done shot a nigga from 20 blocks away, that's a crazy angle
I'll pull the nina out thats a baby banger, why the fuck these niggas writing statements on the affidavit
I can have this bitch do a hex on you, but she is not a Haitan
I'll prolly get paid for steppin on white, but I am not a racist
I'm on my way, out to the hills, so it's prolly gated
I'm finna buy 2 Hellcats, we'll prolly race em'
He can't go nowhere but his hood, so we caught him dangling
I can't be with girly poppin that hoe, she'll prolly mace him
If I get a clean pure batch, Ill prolly taste it
And hit it with some shit I had put up, now the pound ancient
You ain't got no hustle in you, that's embarrassing
Bitch I got cold blood runnin in my veins, this shit inherited
I think I got a route, lets hit Connecticut, cause I'm the type to see some shit from far than get ahead of it
Finna buy a pint of purp and I ain't sellin it
That bitch lying to you like she ain't fucked, but she ain't celibate
I'm finna learn about this bank, then I'm scammin it
Then take a nigga bitch to the traphouse, then i'm rammin it
But I'm still clutchin the pole, while I'm crammin it
I'm sick they sent doggie that way, and he tellin it
I was gon' give girly the dick, but I'm smellin it
She put a pricetag on the cat, why you sellin it
I can't even hit the party, I think 12 in it
I was gon bring that package in, and sell in it
They was tryna keep me out the streets, but I fell in em
They cooked big bro back in the day, it was a failed mission
I made a killin sellin dog, hittin pale bitches
Then I made wet shit on the floor, I couldn't stop hittin it
I just fucked this bitch for 12 hours straight, I couldn't stop hittin it
Hold on I'm finna turn my phone off, I think the cops listeningYou might also likeEmbed

songs.title: Building Fell 2
songs.embed_content: Read “Building Fell 2” by AK Bandamont on Genius
songs.lyrics:
5 ContributorsBuilding Fell 2 Lyrics[Intro: AK Bandamont & Denzel Washington]
(Enrgy made this one)
AK Bandamont nigga
I get bands a lot nigga
See, you are what you are in this world (You know that, yeah)
That's either one of two things
Either you're somebody, or you're nobody. Be right back

[Verse: AK Bandamont]
When I hit the road, got white stuff in the seat, that's on the bible
If I make it snow, them hoes will be going crazy for a while
If that bitch say she don't feel safe, hittin' the road, then I should drive you
That lil' bitch said she ain't ever have the stuffs, said "You should try too."
Shoutout my pops, got fifty, ninety racks, so that's my idol
I've just seen the trap bust down a whole pound, with my eyes open
I just hit your hood and killed like ten opps, fuck a rival
You think your nigga crazy until he meet AK, he's suicidal
I've been selling dope legit for a few years, I used a flyer
And why she acting like my name Nick Cannon, and she Mariah?
You can't cut up my work, unless you do it precise, is you entitled?
I was in the church, not feeling the shit they say, fuck the Messiah
I've been cutting work nonstop, I'm off to eat, I can't retire
She keep actin' stupid, so I made her strip, she wear a wire
You gotta know that if you, ever try to jank me you a die-er
Or like a bitch she sniff through a blue bean to get higher
Yeah, she tryna to stay higher
I can make these plays and make six bands, I got great buyers
My dog was cooking up dope in the woods, he started eight fires
I was fucking while I was drivin', the wheels fell off, I had to change tires
I got my name higher
Made thirty seven this week, made 60 before I got a 'caine-pire
Hit this while I grab something to whip up lean, bro I ain't lying
It's funny when I make songs, I talk cash shit, but I ain't trying
Just broke the chopper down, now it's a drake, its a K child
Up the Glock and make you give up everything, and make you lay down
Just ran through a half pound a couple times, now I need eight pounds
Dropped, took a duece two times and poured a four, boy that's an eight-ounce
Shit back when it was petty, and made a fifty off a fake ounce
Up the Glock and shoot lil' dog two times, and made his face bounce
You ever woke up broke and need some cheese? So take a day out
Had to make a band before I head home, what's your day count?
Yeah, I'm with the mob nigga
Don't talk about some shit that you don't know, you might get lost in it
If you ever see him around them, just know that's my nigga
I got this fiend who sniff and work construction, look like Bob Builder
Don't ask to front, you niggas broke as shit, you know your spot nigga
I see you out, I'ma shoot at you off rip as soon as I spot niggas
Your bitch gave me neck, you wanna kill me, I'ma pop niggas
I pull it out, and put it in her jaw, like a popsicle
Shit, we all step on work, just tell me who did it
This bitch don't fucking care, she tryna to die, she love to shoot crystals
With my fiend [?], with the bald head look like Bruce willis
I was tryna stack my bread up to the roof, but I need two ceilings
[Outro: AK Bandamont, Idris Elba & Denzel Washington]
I need these fresh. 'Cause if I have to come back here and get you, you know what it is (We don't play that shit)
Tango. Where's my money?  (You better have all that shit) Redtop gave you the package. You're supposed to be handing me my money. Here's a jar right here. Twenty percent
Oh you got the jar?
That's right
Get the fuck out of here-oh, what you gonna do? What the fuck you gonna do, Frank? Huh? What you doing? You gonna shoot me, in front of everybody? Huh? Come onYou might also likeEmbed
